idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Melody: short motif in the upper register (A4 TO C5 TO D5 etc.).
# Uses small stepwise motion and mixed durations 
#(0.5, 0.25, 1.0, 2.0 beats) 
#to create hook and phrasing

playNote(69, beats = 0.5) #A4, pickup
playNote(72, beats = 1) #C5, Stable beat
playNote(74, beats = 0.5) #D5, Upward movement
playNote(72, beats = 0.25) #C5, Quick return
playNote(74, beats = 0.5) # D5, Small embellishment
playNote(72, beats = 0.25) # C5, quick echo

# Slight rythmic change to finish the phrase
playNote(74, beats = 0.5)
playNote(72, beats = 0.25)
playNote(74, beats = 1)
playNote(69, beats = 0.5)
playNote(71, beats = 1)
playNote(69, beats = 2)

#Structural rest to seperate sections; creates expectation.
rest(32.25)

# Bass/ Accompaniment ostinato repeated 4 times.
# Low pitches (D3, Eb3, Bb2, etc.) establish harmonic grounding and groove

for i in range(4):  
    playNote(51, beats = 1)
    playNote(58, beats = 1.5)
    playNote(51, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(50, beats = 1)
    playNote(46, beats = 1.5)
    playNote(50, beats = 1)
    playNote(46, beats = 1.5)
    playNote(44, beats = 0.5)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
playNote(69, beats = 0.5) #A4 - opening accent
playNote(71, beats = 1) # B4 - Step up, longer held tone
playNote(74, beats = 0.5) #D5 - leap upward
rest(beats = 1/2) # Adds breath before repeat


playNote(74, beats = 1) # D5 - repeat of high note
playNote(69, beats = 0.5) # A4 return to original tone
playNote(71, beats = 1) #B4 - small rise to finish phrase

rest(beats = 12) #Long pause to relect shift in tone
#Repetition to form a steady base rhythm
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1 
playNote(30, beats= 1) #F1
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1 
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1
playNote(30, beats= 1) #F1
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1 
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1 
playNote(30, beats= 1) #F1

rest(1)
    
playNote (60, beats = 1) #C4   
playNote (60, beats = 1) #C4
playNote (60, beats = 1) #C4
playNote (60, beats = 1) #C4
# establishes a calm pulse

rest (4)
# Increases energy and tension
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3
playNote (55, beats = 0.5) #G3

rest (35)
#Provides closure through a very low bass
playNote (35, beats = 0.5) # B1

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
playNote(69, beats = 0.5) #A4
playNote(71, beats = 1) #Moves up to B4
playNote(74, beats = 0.5) # Jumps to D5 for a half beat
rest(beats = 1/2) #short rest

playNote(72, beats = 0.25) #C5
playNote(74, beats = 0.5) #D5
playNote(72, beats = 0.25) #Repeats C5
rest (5) #Long rest to shift tone

playNote(69, beats = 0.5) #A4 opens with a bright, clear pitch
playNote(71, beats = 1) #B4
playNote(74, beats = 0.5) #D5 small leap
rest(beats = 1/2)

playNote(50, beats = 0.5) #D3
playNote(54, beats = 1) #F3 
playNote(62, beats = 0.5) #D4
playNote(54, beats = 1) #F3
playNote(64, beats = 0.5) #E4
playNote(62, beats = 0.25) #D4

rest (2.75)

playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #Repeat for B1
playNote(30, beats= 1) #F1 
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1
playNote(30, beats= 1) #F1 
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1 
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1 
playNote(30, beats= 1) #F1 
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1 
playNote(35, beats=0.5) #B1  
playNote(30, beats= 1) #F1 

rest (8) #Creating a space for new music section

playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #Return to G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (32, beats = 0.5) #G1
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2
playNote (40, beats = 0.25) #E2


for i in range(4):  #Repeat the following phrase 4 times
    playNote(51, beats = 1) #D3
    playNote(58, beats = 1.5) #A3/Bb3
    playNote(51, beats = 0.5) #D3
    playNote(50, beats = 1) #C3
    playNote(46, beats = 1.5) #A2
    playNote(50, beats = 1) #C3
    playNote(46, beats = 1.5) #A2
    playNote(44, beats = 0.5) #G2

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
#Define note values using relevant intervals from A

A  = 70 #A4
Db = A + 1 #Db4
F  = A + 5 #F4
G  = A + 7 #G4
Ab = A + 8 #AB4
Bb = A + 10 #Bb4

rest (14) #Long pause
for i in range(1):
    playNote(Db) #Play Db4
    playNote(Db) #Repeat Db4
    
    rest(12)
for i in range(1):
    playNote(Db) #Play Db4 again
    playNote(Db) #Repeat Db4
    
    
for i in range(1):
    playNote(Db) #Db4
    playNote(Db) #Repeat Db4
    rest (70) #Very long rest
